籤詩版本二:
Kuv xav ntxias tus Immortal Gui mus rau hauv Toad Palace, tab sis kuv yuav qhib lub qhov rooj saum ntuj ceeb tsheej thiab tso koj mus.
Tam sim no, xov xwm zoo, sawv daws luag ntawm cov paj saum toj saud
詩意:
Qhov no hexagram tuav lub cim ntawm immortal osmanthus.
Yuav tsum muaj neeg muaj koob meej nyob hauv txhua yam.
解曰: Cov tub lag luam nyiam. Muaj (tsis) txaus ntshai thaum hnav nws. Tus mob tau kho thiab qhov kev foob raug daws. Ua txhua yam koj ua tau.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua siab zoo thiab xav txog
Gao Huaide (926-982), lub npe hu ua Zangyong, yug hauv Changshan, Zhending (tam sim no Zhengding, Hebei).
Thaum lub sij hawm "Chenqiao Mutiny", vim Gao Huaide txhawb Zhao Kuangyin ua huab tais, nws tau nce mus rau lwm tus thawj saib xyuas nyob rau hauv pem hauv ntej ntawm lub palace.
Gao Huaide kuj tau sib yuav tus muam ntawm Song Taizu Zhao Kuangyin (Zhao Kuangyin muaj ob tug viv ncaus, ib tug tuag hluas thiab posthumously hu ua Princess Chen; lwm tus tau sib yuav rau Miford, tab sis hmoov tsis nws tus txiv tuag thiab tam sim no nws yog poj ntsuam. nws tus tub huabtais hlob ntawm Yan). Lub npe hu ua Prince Consort Duwei.
(Ua ib tus thawj coj thiab yuav poj huab tais tus muam, tsis tas yuav txhawj xeeb txog tsis muaj txoj haujlwm raug cai.)
聖意: Lub tsev muaj kev khav theeb, tus kheej muaj hmoov zoo, nrhiav kev nplua nuj, thiab kev lag luam muaj kev phom sij, kev sib yuav muaj kev phom sij, Liujia muaj kev phom sij, silkworms nyob rau hauv kev phom sij, teb tsis zoo, silkworms muaj kev phom sij, rau tsiaj yog tsis pom zoo, nrhiav neeg tsis yooj yim, kev foob pej xeem yog kev khav theeb, tsiv teb tsaws chaw tsis muaj hmoo, poob khoom, muaj mob, Anshan, qhov ntxa, qub kev zoo siab
古人: Ua siab zoo thiab xav txog
第X籤: Nees nkaum-peb yeej qhov rho npe
